item.title: Ubuntu错误-Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock
item.description: 报错信息 E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it? 解决办法 查看运行的线程 ps -A | grep apt-get # sudo kill processnumber # 关闭apt进程 我的没有发现进程， 可能是上次运行安装或更新时没有正常完成造成的 终端输入 sudo rm /var/cache/apt/archives/lock sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock
